shortAnswer: Big O notation describes the performance of an algorithm.
detailedAnswer: Big O notation provides an upper bound on the time complexity of an algorithm in the worst-case scenario.

shortAnswer: RESTful API is an architectural style for web services.
detailedAnswer: REST stands for Representational State Transfer. It's an architectural style for designing networked applications.

shortAnswer: Docker containers are lightweight, stand-alone packages that contain everything needed to run a piece of software.
detailedAnswer: Docker containers are encapsulated, loosely isolated environments that run a single application.
